1:
I love Yahweh because he hears
\q my voice and my pleas for mercy.
\q
2:
Because he listened to me,
\q I will call on him as long as I live.
3:
The cords of death surrounded me,
\q and the snares of Sheol confronted me;
\q I felt anguish and sorrow.
\q
4:
Then I called on the name of Yahweh:
\q "Please Yahweh, rescue my life."
6:
Yahweh protects the naive;
\q I was brought low, and he saved me.
7:
My soul can return to its resting place,
\q for Yahweh has been good to me.
\q
8:
For you rescued my life from death,
\q my eyes from tears,
\q and my feet from stumbling.
9:
I will serve Yahweh
\q in the land of the living.
\q
10:
I believed in him, even when I said,
\q "I am greatly afflicted."
\q
11:
I rashly said,
\q "All men are liars."
12:
How can I repay Yahweh
\q for all his kindnesses to me?
\q
13:
I will raise the cup of salvation,
\q and call on the name of Yahweh.
\q
14:
I will fulfill my vows to Yahweh
\q in the presence of all his people.
\q
15:
Precious in the sight of Yahweh
\q is the death of his saints.
17:
I will offer to you the sacrifice of thanksgiving
\q and will call on the name of Yahweh.
18:
I will fulfill my vows to Yahweh
\q in the presence of all his people,
\q
19:
in the courts of Yahweh's house,
\q in your midst, Jerusalem.
\q Praise Yahweh.
